6497428/e 6497423/f Leo 1500/w sunny/t 6.91: speak Willy "Yes, that's correct... Linus lives on the mainland with the rest of the villagers.#$b#After hearing your story... I wanted to help. So, I talked to Linus, and we've made a plan.$h"
6497428/e 6497423/f Leo 1500/w sunny/t 6.105: speak Willy "I can take you back for a visit any time you wish.$h#$b#The point is.... you can't live here forever...#$b#You know, there are other people your age back home, too. I'm sure they'd be pleased to meet you..."

Changes.LogName: IslandSouth Events - Willy dead, Linus dead

6497428/e 6497423/f Leo 1500/w sunny/t 6.91: speak Willy "After hearing your story... I wanted to help. So, I've made a plan.$h"
6497428/e 6497423/f Leo 1500/w sunny/t 6.95: speak Willy "There is... something I wish to offer..."

6497428/e 6497423/f Leo 1500/w sunny/t 6.89: speak Willy "I... can't just sit here and watch this happen!$s"
6497428/e 6497423/f Leo 1500/w sunny/t 6.101: speak Willy "Leo...#$b#I'd like you to come back with us, to Stardew Valley.#$b#It's a beautiful place... not as warm as here, but still full of life...#$b#I know the lay of the land, and many things about the waters, the trees, the animals, and more...#$b#You see... despite my magical appearance, I'm in tune with nature as well. You might say we're 'birds of a feather'.$h#$b#So, that's why I want to ask... Leo... will you come back with us?"
6497428/e 6497423/f Leo 1500/w sunny/t 6.114: quickQuestion #I think it's a great idea.#I think he should stay here.#It's up to Leo...(break)pause 400\emote Willy 32\pause 500(break)pause 100\emote Willy 28(break)faceDirection farmer 1\pause 400

6497428/e 6497423/f Leo 1500/w sunny/t 6.108: speak Leo "F... friends? Could they be friends?$u"
